
#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long test,n,cc;

    cin >> test;

    while(test--)
    {
        cin >> n;

        if(n<=26)
            cout << 1;
        else
        {
            cc=n/26;

            n-=cc*26;

            if(n>0)
                cc++;

            cout << cc;
        }

        cout << "\n";

    }

}
